short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Too Many Cooks in the Kitchen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FirstTaste Plus : 
   Giving you the tools to hide, remove or highlight posts within posts and recipes.
   Clickable links, image emoticons, Google IM style text formatting support.
   Notify widget which alerts you to unread comments in your posts.
   Sort the search results by title, ratings, comment counts, date.
   Rich text graphical text editor.
   More to follow...

Enjoy, 
mwolfe

---
Release 0.1.0
New feature:
  Recipe comments sorted like rest of site, most recent first.
  SuperSearch: Added support for bookmark sorting
Improvements:
   Browser back functionality identical with HTML5 and original editor.

---
Release 0.0.9
New feature:
  WYSIWYG Editor: textarea/forms converted to content editable
                  - graphical emoticons, rich text formatting with keyboard controls
  SuperSearch: Nearly every component on the site is not sortable, from posts to recipes to friends, cookbooks.

Improvements:
  Preferences saved to extension branch, more error checking

---
Release 0.0.8
New feature:
  Notify widget.
  Sortable search results (date, comments, ratings, title etc).
  New options features (header/ads/featured/experts tab).
  New hidden emoticons
  
Improvements:
  No innerHTML access.
  AJAX non-blocking on widget and site UI improvements.
  Shiny new icon!

---
Release 0.0.7
New feature:
   Google IM emoticons.

Improvements:
   Optimized regular expressions = much faster
   Add support for HTML1.1 style formatting
  
---
Release 0.0.6
New features:
   Google IM style formatting.
      Wrap with * for bold
      Wrap with ! for underline
      Wrap with _ for italics
   Links are activated.
   Colorized comments
        Personal comments,posts,recipes in special color
   Options controls
       NoAds
       NoFeaturedPosts

Improvements:
   Will only run when at http*://firsttaste.kraftcanada.com/*
   Will only run if someone is logged in.
